content:
Yes, there are several brands that are committed to both sustainable fashion and inclusivity. Here are a few examples:

1. Girlfriend Collective - they use recycled materials to create their activewear and offer sizes up to 6XL.

2. Able - they offer sustainable and ethically made clothing and accessories in sizes up to 3XL.

3. Ref Jeans - a denim-focused line from Reformation, they use sustainable materials and offer inclusive sizing options up to 24.

4. Christy Dawn - they produce sustainable and ethically made dresses and clothing in sizes up to XL.

5. Mara Hoffman - in addition to offering inclusive sizing options, they are committed to sustainable and ethical fashion production.

These are just a few examples of brands that offer both sustainable fashion and inclusivity, but there are many more fashion brands that are making efforts to combine the two.
